data.title: The Witcher 3
data.desc: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter for hire, embarks on an epic journey to find his former apprentice, Ciri, before The Wild Hunt can capture her and bring the destruction of the world.

data.title: Forza Horizon 3
data.desc: Forza Horizon 3 is an open world racing video game developed by Playground Games and published by Microsoft Studios for Xbox One and Microsoft Windows 10. The game features cross-platform play between the two platforms.

data.title: Grand Theft Auto V
data.desc: Three very different criminals team-up for a series of daring, yet very profitable, heists in the corrupt city of Los Santos.

data.title: Uncharted 4
data.desc: Nathan Drake comes out of retirement one last time, to go on a dangerous quest for Henry Avery's pirate treasure with his brother, Sam. But will he make it to the end of his epic journey?

data.title: Injustice 2
data.desc: Batman and his allies work towards putting the pieces of society back together while struggling against those who want to restore Superman's regime. In the midst of the chaos, a new threat appears that will put Earth's existence at risk.

data.title: FIFA 18
data.desc: FIFA 18 is the second instalment in the series to use the Frostbite 3 game engine, although some versions of the game use a different game engine. The PlayStation 4 and Xbox One versions include a continuation of The Journey a story-based mode that was originally in FIFA 17 entitled 'The Journey: Hunter Returns.'
